Henry Cele (Zulu pronunciation: ) (20 June 1941 – 2 December 2007) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa ama ama maka ngosipụta ya nke nnukwu Zulu Warrior King Shaka kaSenzangakhona na ihe nkiri telivishọn South Africa Shaka Zulu (1986) yana na ihe nkiri telivishọn Shaka Zulu: The Last Great Warrior afọ iri na ise ka e mesịrị.
A mụrụ Henry Cele na 20 June 1941 na KwaMashu, Durban, South Africa. Dịka onye otu ezinụlọ Cele, a na-akpọ ya aha ezinụlọ ya Ndosi (Bavela KwaMthetwa), maọbụ Magaye.

Cele, onye a na-akpọ "Black Cat" maka ike ya dịka onye nche, gbara Aces United na South African Soccer League (SASL) ochie n'afọ 1960. Ọ gbakwara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Lamontville Golden Arrows f.c na Lamontville Township ma zụọ otu klọb bọọlụ ọkachamara na South Africa ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Na Satọdee, ọ gbara bọọlụ na Durity Football Club na Commercial Football League na Durban.
Dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Cele bụ onye ama ama na mba ụwa, na-eme ihe nkiri na obodo ya bụ South Africa na United States
A họpụtara ya maka ọrụ Shaka na miniseries mgbe ọ rụchara otu ọrụ ahụ na mmepụta ihe nkiri South Africa nke Shaka Zulu
E mere ka Cele pụta ìhè na African American Jet Magazine (3 Nọvemba 1986 mbipụta, peeji nke 57) banyere ọrụ ya na Shaka Zulu–The Mini Series
Ọ pụtara na nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri South Africa na mmemme telivishọn yana ihe nkiri mba ụwa.
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, Cele si n'ụlọ ya dị na Glenmore, n'ebe ndịda Durban, kwaga n'obodo ya dị na obodo KwaMashu.
Cele nwụrụ n'abalị 2 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007 na St Augustine's Hospital na Durban. E liri ya na Stellawood Cemetery na Durban eThekwini Metropolitan Municipality, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa.
